title: EmAndEnE ennennavO
sahitya:
EmAndEnE ennennavO ninaindu mAimAlamE idu enrariyAmalE


anupallavi

  vAi vArttaiyil valvi vAdu nidam solli sEi manam koNDa ennai tigahikka vaittAi viddaiyil


caraNam    eNNattil ettanaiyO kOTTaigaL kaTTinEn un vaNNa mukhan kanDu eduvum marandEn
maNNisai mALigai alaiyil maraivadu pOl eNNil AshaigaLum azhindanavE nAnE
